overview: Face it, nobody on Earth gives a hoot about the Moon. Every time he comes out to say “hi”, we all shout “boring!” and head off to sleep. Well guess what, pal… He’s sick of it. Join Moon as he sets off on an odyssey across the solar system in search of a planet that will appreciate him for who he is and give him the respect he deserves.
tagline: Jealous of the Sun’s stardom, the Moon journeys into space, searching for a planet that actually cares about him.
title: Sucks To Be The Moon
